text: Paki (Urdu: پاکے) is a British English racial slur targeted at Pakistanis. It is mostly used in the United Kingdom, Ireland, Australia, New Zealand, South Africa, America, and India. The word is taken from the Persian, Urdu, and Pashto word Pak (پاک) which means purity in the Persian, Pashto, and Urdu languages. == References == Category:Pejoratives Category:English profanity Category:Slurs
title: Paki
